    <div><br>&#160;</div>
    <div>
      <div>
        <hr style="COLOR: black" align="center" noshade size="4" width="100%">
      </div><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">FOURTH
SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">(Senior
Notes due 2014)</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">THIS FOURTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE
</font>(this &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Fourth
Supplemental Indenture</font>&#8221;) is dated as of January 7, 2010, among OMEGA
HEALTHCARE INVESTORS, INC., a Maryland corporation (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Issuer</font>&#8221;), each of the
SUBSIDIARY GUARANTORS listed on Schedule I hereto (collectively, the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Subsidiary
Guarantors</font>&#8221;), each of the NEW SUBSIDIARIES listed on Schedule II hereto
(collectively, the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">New Subsidiaries</font>&#8221;),
and U.S. BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, a national banking association organized and
existing under the laws of the United States of America, as trustee (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Trustee</font>&#8221;).</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">W
I T N E S S E T H :</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, the Issuer and the
Subsidiary Guarantors have heretofore executed and delivered to the Trustee an
Indenture, dated as of March 22, 2004 (as amended by the First Supplemental
Indenture dated as of July 20, 2004, and as further amended by the Second
Supplemental Indenture dated as of November 5, 2004, and the Third Supplemental
Indenture dated as of December 1, 2005, the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Indenture</font>&#8221;),
providing for the issuance of the Issuer&#8217;s 7% Senior Notes due 2014 (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Notes</font>&#8221;);</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, Section 9.01 of the
Indenture authorizes the Issuer, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee,
together, to amend or supplement the Indenture, without notice to or consent of
any Holder of the Notes, for the purpose of making any change that would not
materially adversely affect the rights of any Holder of the Notes;</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, the Issuer has
recently created or acquired, as appropriate, the New Subsidiaries, which are
required to become Subsidiary Guarantors pursuant to Section 4.14 of the
Indenture;</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, in Section 1.01 of
the Indenture, the term &#8220;Subsidiary Guarantors&#8221; is defined to include all
Persons that become a Subsidiary Guarantor by the terms of the Indenture after
the Closing Date;</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, Section 10.01 of the
Indenture provides that each Subsidiary Guarantor shall be a guarantor of the
Issuer&#8217;s obligations under the Notes, subject to the terms and conditions
described in the Indenture;</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">NOW, THEREFORE</font>, in
consideration of the foregoing and for other good and valuable consideration,
the receipt of which is hereby acknowledged, the Issuer, the Subsidiary
Guarantors, the New Subsidiaries and the Trustee mutually covenant and agree for
the equal and ratable benefit of the Holders of the Notes as
follows:</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">
<tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">1.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">CAPITALIZED
      TERMS.&#160;&#160;Capitalized terms used herein without definition shall
      have the meanings assigned to them in the
  Indenture.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">
<tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">2.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">AMENDMENT
      TO GUARANTEE.&#160;&#160;The New Subsidiaries hereby agree, jointly and
      severally with all other Subsidiary Guarantors, to guarantee the Issuer&#8217;s
      obligations under the Notes on the terms and subject to the conditions set
      forth in the Indenture, and to be bound by, and to receive the benefit of,
      all other applicable provisions of the Indenture as a Subsidiary
      Guarantor.&#160;&#160;Such guarantees shall be evidenced by the respective
      New Subsidiaries&#8217; execution of Subsidiary Guarantees, the form of which is
      attached as Exhibit E to the Indenture, and shall be effective as of the
      date hereof.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">
<tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">3.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">NO
      RECOURSE AGAINST OTHERS.&#160;&#160;No past, present or future director,
      officer, employee, partner, affiliate, beneficiary or stockholder of the
      New Subsidiaries, as such, shall have any liability for any obligations of
      the Issuer or any Subsidiary Guarantor under the Notes, any Guarantees,
      the Indenture or this Fourth Supplemental Indenture or for any claim based
      on, in respect of, or by reason of, such obligations or their
      creation.&#160;&#160;Each Holder of the Notes, by accepting and holding a
      Note, waives and releases all such liability.&#160;&#160;Such waiver and
      release are part of the consideration for the issuance of the
      Notes.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">

            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">4.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">NEW
      YORK LAW TO GOVERN.&#160;&#160;The laws of the State of New York shall
      govern and be used to construe this Fourth Supplemental
      Indenture.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>

      parties may sign any number of copies of this Fourth Supplemental
      Indenture.&#160;&#160;Each signed copy shall be an original, but all of
      them together shall represent the same
  agreement.</font></div>
            </td>

      </div>
    </div><br><br>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">FIFTH
SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">(Senior
Notes due 2014)</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">THIS FIFTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE
</font>(this &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Fifth
Supplemental Indenture</font>&#8221;) is dated as of January 29, 2010, among OMEGA
HEALTHCARE INVESTORS, INC., a Maryland corporation (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Issuer</font>&#8221;), each of the
SUBSIDIARY GUARANTORS listed on Schedule I hereto (collectively, the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Subsidiary
Guarantors</font>&#8221;), each of the NEW SUBSIDIARIES listed on Schedule II hereto
(collectively, the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">New Subsidiaries</font>&#8221;),
and U.S. BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, a national banking association organized and
existing under the laws of the United States of America, as trustee (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Trustee</font>&#8221;).</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">W
I T N E S S E T H :</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, the Issuer and the
Subsidiary Guarantors have heretofore executed and delivered to the Trustee an
Indenture, dated as of March 22, 2004 (as amended by the First Supplemental
Indenture dated as of July 20, 2004, and as further amended by the Second
Supplemental Indenture dated as of November 5, 2004, the Third Supplemental
Indenture dated as of December 1, 2005 and the Fourth Supplemental Indenture
dated January 7, 2010, the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Indenture</font>&#8221;),
providing for the issuance of the Issuer&#8217;s 7% Senior Notes due 2014 (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Notes</font>&#8221;);</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, Section 9.01 of the
Indenture authorizes the Issuer, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee,
together, to amend or supplement the Indenture, without notice to or consent of
any Holder of the Notes, for the purpose of making any change that would not
materially adversely affect the rights of any Holder of the Notes;</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS,</font> Section 5.01(e) of
the Indenture provides that any Restricted Subsidiary may consolidate or merge
with or into another Restricted Subsidiary;</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS, </font>one of the New
Subsidiaries, OHI Asset IV (PA) Silver Lake Trust, is successor-by-merger to
Silver Lake Real Estate, LLC, by virtue of a merger effective December 31, 2009,
and is required to become a Subsidiary Guarantor pursuant to Section 4.14 of the
Indenture;</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, the Issuer has
created or acquired, as appropriate, the other New Subsidiaries, which are
required to become Subsidiary Guarantors pursuant to Section 4.14 of the
Indenture;</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, in Section 1.01 of
the Indenture, the term &#8220;Subsidiary Guarantors&#8221; is defined to include all
Persons that become a Subsidiary Guarantor by the terms of the Indenture after
the Closing Date;</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, Section 10.01 of the
Indenture provides that each Subsidiary Guarantor shall be a guarantor of the
Issuer&#8217;s obligations under the Notes, subject to the terms and conditions
described in the Indenture;</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">NOW, THEREFORE</font>, in
consideration of the foregoing and for other good and valuable consideration,
the receipt of which is hereby acknowledged, the Issuer, the Subsidiary
Guarantors, the New Subsidiaries and the Trustee mutually covenant and agree for
the equal and ratable benefit of the Holders of the Notes as
follows:</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">
<tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">1.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">CAPITALIZED
      TERMS.&#160;&#160;Capitalized terms used herein without definition shall
      have the meanings assigned to them in the
  Indenture.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">
<tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">2.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">AMENDMENT
      TO GUARANTEE.&#160;&#160;The New Subsidiaries hereby agree, jointly and
      severally with all other Subsidiary Guarantors, to guarantee the Issuer&#8217;s
      obligations under the Notes on the terms and subject to the conditions set
      forth in the Indenture, and to be bound by, and to receive the benefit of,
      all other applicable provisions of the Indenture as a Subsidiary
      Guarantor.&#160;&#160;Such guarantees shall be evidenced by the respective
      New Subsidiaries&#8217; execution of Subsidiary Guarantees, the form of which is
      attached as Exhibit E to the Indenture, and shall be effective as of the
      date hereof.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">
<tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">3.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">NO
      RECOURSE AGAINST OTHERS.&#160;&#160;No past, present or future director,
      officer, employee, partner, affiliate, beneficiary or stockholder of the
      New Subsidiaries, as such, shall have any liability for any obligations of
      the Issuer or any Subsidiary Guarantor under the Notes, any Guarantees,
      the Indenture or this Fifth Supplemental Indenture or for any claim based
      on, in respect of, or by reason of, such obligations or their
      creation.&#160;&#160;Each Holder of the Notes, by accepting and holding a
      Note, waives and releases all such liability.&#160;&#160;Such waiver and
      release are part of the consideration for the issuance of the
      Notes.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>

            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">NEW
      YORK LAW TO GOVERN.&#160;&#160;The laws of the State of New York shall
      govern and be used to construe this Fifth Supplemental
      Indenture.</font></div>

              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">COUNTERPARTS.&#160;&#160;The
      parties may sign any number of copies of this Fifth Supplemental
      Indenture.&#160;&#160;Each signed copy shall be an original, but all of
      them together shall represent the same
  agreement.</font></div>

SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">(Senior
Notes due 2014)</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">THIS SIXTH SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE
</font>(this &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Sixth
Supplemental Indenture</font>&#8221;) is dated as of February 2, 2010, among OMEGA
HEALTHCARE INVESTORS, INC., a Maryland corporation (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Issuer</font>&#8221;), each of the
SUBSIDIARY GUARANTORS listed on Schedule I hereto (collectively, the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Subsidiary
Guarantors</font>&#8221;), OHI Asset II (FL), LLC (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">New Subsidiary</font>&#8221;), and
U.S. BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, a national banking association organized and
existing under the laws of the United States of America, as trustee (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Trustee</font>&#8221;).</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">W
I T N E S S E T H :</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, the Issuer and the
Subsidiary Guarantors have heretofore executed and delivered to the Trustee an
Indenture, dated as of March 22, 2004 (as amended by the First Supplemental
Indenture dated as of July 20, 2004, and as further amended by the Second
Supplemental Indenture dated as of November 5, 2004, the Third Supplemental
Indenture dated as of December 1, 2005, the Fourth Supplemental Indenture dated
January 7, 2010, and the Fifth Supplemental Indenture dated January 29, 2010,
the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Indenture</font>&#8221;),
providing for the issuance of the Issuer&#8217;s 7% Senior Notes due 2014 (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Notes</font>&#8221;);</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, Section 9.01 of the
Indenture authorizes the Issuer, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee,
together, to amend or supplement the Indenture, without notice to or consent of
any Holder of the Notes, for the purpose of making any change that would not
materially adversely affect the rights of any Holder of the Notes;</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, the Issuer has
created the New Subsidiary, which is required to become a Subsidiary Guarantor
pursuant to Section 4.14 of the Indenture;</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, in Section 1.01 of
the Indenture, the term &#8220;Subsidiary Guarantors&#8221; is defined to include all
Persons that become a Subsidiary Guarantor by the terms of the Indenture after
the Closing Date; and</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, Section 10.01 of the
Indenture provides that each Subsidiary Guarantor shall be a guarantor of the
Issuer&#8217;s obligations under the Notes, subject to the terms and conditions
described in the Indenture.</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">NOW, THEREFORE</font>, in
consideration of the foregoing and for other good and valuable consideration,
the receipt of which is hereby acknowledged, the Issuer, the Subsidiary
Guarantors, the New Subsidiary and the Trustee mutually covenant and agree for
the equal and ratable benefit of the Holders of the Notes as
follows:</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">
<tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">1.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">CAPITALIZED
      TERMS.&#160;&#160;Capitalized terms used herein without definition shall
      have the meanings assigned to them in the
  Indenture.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">
<tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">2.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">AMENDMENT
      TO GUARANTEE.&#160;&#160;The New Subsidiary hereby agrees, jointly and
      severally with all other Subsidiary Guarantors, to guarantee the Issuer&#8217;s
      obligations under the Notes on the terms and subject to the conditions set
      forth in the Indenture, and to be bound by, and to receive the benefit of,
      all other applicable provisions of the Indenture as a Subsidiary
      Guarantor.&#160;&#160;Such guarantee shall be evidenced by the New
      Subsidiary&#8217;s execution of a Subsidiary Guarantee, the form of which is
      attached as Exhibit E to the Indenture, and shall be effective as of the
      date hereof.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">
<tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">3.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">NO
      RECOURSE AGAINST OTHERS.&#160;&#160;No past, present or future director,
      officer, employee, partner, affiliate, beneficiary or stockholder of the
      New Subsidiary, as such, shall have any liability for any obligations of
      the Issuer or any Subsidiary Guarantor under the Notes, any Guarantees,
      the Indenture or this Sixth Supplemental Indenture or for any claim based
      on, in respect of, or by reason of, such obligations or their
      creation.&#160;&#160;Each Holder of the Notes, by accepting and holding a
      Note, waives and releases all such liability.&#160;&#160;Such waiver and
      release are part of the consideration for the issuance of the
      Notes.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">
<tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">4.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">NEW
      YORK LAW TO GOVERN.&#160;&#160;The laws of the State of New York shall
      govern and be used to construe this Sixth Supplemental
      Indenture.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">

            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">COUNTERPARTS.&#160;&#160;The
      parties may sign any number of copies of this Sixth Supplemental
      Indenture.&#160;&#160;Each signed copy shall be an original, but all of
      them together shall represent the same
  agreement.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>

      OF HEADINGS.&#160;&#160;The Section headings herein are for convenience
      only and shall not affect the construction
  hereof.</font></div>

    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Reunion

    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">San

      </div><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">FIRST
SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">(Senior
Notes due 2016)</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">THIS FIRST SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE
</font>(this &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">First
Supplemental Indenture</font>&#8221;) is dated as of January 7, 2010, among OMEGA
HEALTHCARE INVESTORS, INC., a Maryland corporation (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Issuer</font>&#8221;), each of the
SUBSIDIARY GUARANTORS listed on Schedule I hereto (collectively, the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Subsidiary
Guarantors</font>&#8221;), each of the NEW SUBSIDIARIES listed on Schedule II hereto
(collectively, the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">New Subsidiaries</font>&#8221;),
and U.S. BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, a national banking association organized and
existing under the laws of the United States of America, as trustee (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Trustee</font>&#8221;).</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">W
I T N E S S E T H :</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, the Issuer and the
Subsidiary Guarantors have heretofore executed and delivered to the Trustee an
Indenture, dated as of December 30, 2005 (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Indenture</font>&#8221;),
providing for the issuance of the Issuer&#8217;s 7% Senior Notes due 2016 (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Notes</font>&#8221;);</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, Section 9.01 of the
Indenture authorizes the Issuer, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee,
together, to amend or supplement the Indenture, without notice to or consent of
any Holder of the Notes, for the purpose of making any change that would not
materially adversely affect the rights of any Holder of the Notes;</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, the Issuer has
recently created or acquired, as appropriate, the New Subsidiaries, which are
required to become Subsidiary Guarantors pursuant to Section 4.14 of the
Indenture;</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, in Section 1.01 of
the Indenture, the term &#8220;Subsidiary Guarantors&#8221; is defined to include all
Persons that become a Subsidiary Guarantor by the terms of the Indenture after
the Closing Date;</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, Section 10.01 of the
Indenture provides that each Subsidiary Guarantor shall be a guarantor of the
Issuer&#8217;s obligations under the Notes, subject to the terms and conditions
described in the Indenture;</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">NOW, THEREFORE</font>, in
consideration of the foregoing and for other good and valuable consideration,
the receipt of which is hereby acknowledged, the Issuer, the Subsidiary
Guarantors, the New Subsidiaries and the Trustee mutually covenant and agree for
the equal and ratable benefit of the Holders of the Notes as
follows:</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">
<tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">1.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">CAPITALIZED
      TERMS.&#160;&#160;Capitalized terms used herein without definition shall
      have the meanings assigned to them in the
  Indenture.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">
<tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">2.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">AMENDMENT
      TO GUARANTEE.&#160;&#160;The New Subsidiaries hereby agree, jointly and
      severally with all other Subsidiary Guarantors, to guarantee the Issuer&#8217;s
      obligations under the Notes on the terms and subject to the conditions set
      forth in the Indenture, and to be bound by, and to receive the benefit of,
      all other applicable provisions of the Indenture as a Subsidiary
      Guarantor.&#160;&#160;Such guarantees shall be evidenced by the respective
      New Subsidiaries&#8217; execution of Subsidiary Guarantees, the form of which is
      attached as Exhibit E to the Indenture, and shall be effective as of the
      date hereof.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">
<tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">3.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">NO
      RECOURSE AGAINST OTHERS.&#160;&#160;No past, present or future director,
      officer, employee, partner, affiliate, beneficiary or stockholder of the
      New Subsidiaries, as such, shall have any liability for any obligations of
      the Issuer or any Subsidiary Guarantor under the Notes, any Guarantees,
      the Indenture or this First Supplemental Indenture or for any claim based
      on, in respect of, or by reason of, such obligations or their
      creation.&#160;&#160;Each Holder of the Notes, by accepting and holding a
      Note, waives and releases all such liability.&#160;&#160;Such waiver and
      release are part of the consideration for the issuance of the
      Notes.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>

      YORK LAW TO GOVERN.&#160;&#160;The laws of the State of New York shall
      govern and be used to construe this First Supplemental
      Indenture.</font></div>

      parties may sign any number of copies of this First Supplemental

    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">(Senior

    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">THIS SECOND SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE
</font>(this &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Second
Supplemental Indenture</font>&#8221;) is dated as of January 29, 2010, among OMEGA
HEALTHCARE INVESTORS, INC., a Maryland corporation (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Issuer</font>&#8221;), each of the
SUBSIDIARY GUARANTORS listed on Schedule I hereto (collectively, the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Subsidiary
Guarantors</font>&#8221;), each of the NEW SUBSIDIARIES listed on Schedule II hereto
(collectively, the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">New Subsidiaries</font>&#8221;),
and U.S. BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, a national banking association organized and
existing under the laws of the United States of America, as trustee (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Trustee</font>&#8221;).</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">W
I T N E S S E T H :</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, the Issuer and the
Subsidiary Guarantors have heretofore executed and delivered to the Trustee an
Indenture, dated as of December 30, 2005 (as amended by the First Supplemental
Indenture dated as of January 7, 2010, the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Indenture</font>&#8221;),
providing for the issuance of the Issuer&#8217;s 7% Senior Notes due 2016 (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Notes</font>&#8221;);</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, Section 9.01 of the
Indenture authorizes the Issuer, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee,
together, to amend or supplement the Indenture, without notice to or consent of
any Holder of the Notes, for the purpose of making any change that would not
materially adversely affect the rights of any Holder of the Notes;</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS,</font> Section 5.01(e) of
the Indenture provides that any Restricted Subsidiary may consolidate or merge
with or into another Restricted Subsidiary;</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS, </font>one of the New
Subsidiaries, OHI Asset IV (PA) Silver Lake Trust, is successor-by-merger to
Silver Lake Real Estate, LLC, by virtue of a merger effective December 31, 2009,
and is required to become a Subsidiary Guarantor pursuant to Section 4.14 of the
Indenture;</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, the Issuer has
created or acquired, as appropriate, the other New Subsidiaries, which are
required to become Subsidiary Guarantors pursuant to Section 4.14 of the
Indenture;</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, in Section 1.01 of
the Indenture, the term &#8220;Subsidiary Guarantors&#8221; is defined to include all
Persons that become a Subsidiary Guarantor by the terms of the Indenture after
the Closing Date;</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, Section 10.01 of the
Indenture provides that each Subsidiary Guarantor shall be a guarantor of the
Issuer&#8217;s obligations under the Notes, subject to the terms and conditions
described in the Indenture;</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">NOW, THEREFORE</font>, in
consideration of the foregoing and for other good and valuable consideration,
the receipt of which is hereby acknowledged, the Issuer, the Subsidiary
Guarantors, the New Subsidiaries and the Trustee mutually covenant and agree for
the equal and ratable benefit of the Holders of the Notes as
follows:</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">
<tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">1.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">CAPITALIZED
      TERMS.&#160;&#160;Capitalized terms used herein without definition shall
      have the meanings assigned to them in the
  Indenture.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">
<tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">2.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">AMENDMENT
      TO GUARANTEE.&#160;&#160;The New Subsidiaries hereby agree, jointly and
      severally with all other Subsidiary Guarantors, to guarantee the Issuer&#8217;s
      obligations under the Notes on the terms and subject to the conditions set
      forth in the Indenture, and to be bound by, and to receive the benefit of,
      all other applicable provisions of the Indenture as a Subsidiary
      Guarantor.&#160;&#160;Such guarantees shall be evidenced by the respective
      New Subsidiaries&#8217; execution of Subsidiary Guarantees, the form of which is
      attached as Exhibit E to the Indenture, and shall be effective as of the
      date hereof.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">
<tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">3.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">NO
      RECOURSE AGAINST OTHERS.&#160;&#160;No past, present or future director,
      officer, employee, partner, affiliate, beneficiary or stockholder of the
      New Subsidiaries, as such, shall have any liability for any obligations of
      the Issuer or any Subsidiary Guarantor under the Notes, any Guarantees,
      the Indenture or this Second Supplemental Indenture or for any claim based
      on, in respect of, or by reason of, such obligations or their
      creation.&#160;&#160;Each Holder of the Notes, by accepting and holding a
      Note, waives and releases all such liability.&#160;&#160;Such waiver and
      release are part of the consideration for the issuance of the
      Notes.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">
<tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">4.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">NEW
      YORK LAW TO GOVERN.&#160;&#160;The laws of the State of New York shall
      govern and be used to construe this Second Supplemental
      Indenture.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">

            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">COUNTERPARTS.&#160;&#160;The
      parties may sign any number of copies of this Second Supplemental
      Indenture.&#160;&#160;Each signed copy shall be an original, but all of
      them together shall represent the same
  agreement.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>

      OF HEADINGS.&#160;&#160;The Section headings herein are for convenience
      only and shall not affect the construction
  hereof.</font></div>

    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Bayside

    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="left"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Orange

    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">THIRD
SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">(Senior
Notes due 2016)</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">THIS THIRD SUPPLEMENTAL INDENTURE
</font>(this &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Third
Supplemental Indenture</font>&#8221;) is dated as of February 2, 2010, among OMEGA
HEALTHCARE INVESTORS, INC., a Maryland corporation (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Issuer</font>&#8221;), each of the
SUBSIDIARY GUARANTORS listed on Schedule I hereto (collectively, the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Subsidiary
Guarantors</font>&#8221;), OHI Asset II (FL), LLC (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">New Subsidiary</font>&#8221;), and
U.S. BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, a national banking association organized and
existing under the laws of the United States of America, as trustee (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Trustee</font>&#8221;).</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">W
I T N E S S E T H :</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, the Issuer and the
Subsidiary Guarantors have heretofore executed and delivered to the Trustee an
Indenture, dated as of December 30, 2005 (as amended by the First Supplemental
Indenture dated as of January 7, 2010, and the Second Supplemental Indenture
dated as of January 29, 2010, the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Indenture</font>&#8221;),
providing for the issuance of the Issuer&#8217;s 7% Senior Notes due 2016 (the &#8220;<font style="DISPLAY: inline; TEXT-DECORATION: underline">Notes</font>&#8221;);</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, Section 9.01 of the
Indenture authorizes the Issuer, the Subsidiary Guarantors and the Trustee,
together, to amend or supplement the Indenture, without notice to or consent of
any Holder of the Notes, for the purpose of making any change that would not
materially adversely affect the rights of any Holder of the Notes;</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, the Issuer has
created the New Subsidiary, which is required to become a Subsidiary Guarantor
pursuant to Section 4.14 of the Indenture;</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, in Section 1.01 of
the Indenture, the term &#8220;Subsidiary Guarantors&#8221; is defined to include all
Persons that become a Subsidiary Guarantor by the terms of the Indenture after
the Closing Date; and</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">WHEREAS</font>, Section 10.01 of the
Indenture provides that each Subsidiary Guarantor shall be a guarantor of the
Issuer&#8217;s obligations under the Notes, subject to the terms and conditions
described in the Indenture.</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt"><font id="TAB1" style="MARGIN-LEFT: 36pt"></font><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">NOW, THEREFORE</font>, in
consideration of the foregoing and for other good and valuable consideration,
the receipt of which is hereby acknowledged, the Issuer, the Subsidiary
Guarantors, the New Subsidiary and the Trustee mutually covenant and agree for
the equal and ratable benefit of the Holders of the Notes as
follows:</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">
<tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">1.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">CAPITALIZED
      TERMS.&#160;&#160;Capitalized terms used herein without definition shall
      have the meanings assigned to them in the
  Indenture.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">
<tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">2.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">AMENDMENT
      TO GUARANTEE.&#160;&#160;The New Subsidiary hereby agrees, jointly and
      severally with all other Subsidiary Guarantors, to guarantee the Issuer&#8217;s
      obligations under the Notes on the terms and subject to the conditions set
      forth in the Indenture, and to be bound by, and to receive the benefit of,
      all other applicable provisions of the Indenture as a Subsidiary
      Guarantor.&#160;&#160;Such guarantee shall be evidenced by the New
      Subsidiary&#8217;s execution of a Subsidiary Guarantee, the form of which is
      attached as Exhibit E to the Indenture, and shall be effective as of the
      date hereof.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">
<tr valign="top">
            <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
              <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">3.&#160;&#160;</font></div>
            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">NO
      RECOURSE AGAINST OTHERS.&#160;&#160;No past, present or future director,
      officer, employee, partner, affiliate, beneficiary or stockholder of the
      New Subsidiary, as such, shall have any liability for any obligations of
      the Issuer or any Subsidiary Guarantor under the Notes, any Guarantees,
      the Indenture or this Third Supplemental Indenture or for any claim based
      on, in respect of, or by reason of, such obligations or their
      creation.&#160;&#160;Each Holder of the Notes, by accepting and holding a
      Note, waives and releases all such liability.&#160;&#160;Such waiver and
      release are part of the consideration for the issuance of the
      Notes.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div>

            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">NEW
      YORK LAW TO GOVERN.&#160;&#160;The laws of the State of New York shall
      govern and be used to construe this Third Supplemental
      Indenture.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>

            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">COUNTERPARTS.&#160;&#160;The
      parties may sign any number of copies of this Third Supplemental
      Indenture.&#160;&#160;Each signed copy shall be an original, but all of
      them together shall represent the same
  agreement.</font></div>
            </td>

            </td>
            <td>
              <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">EFFECT
      OF HEADINGS.&#160;&#160;The Section headings herein are for convenience
      only and shall not affect the construction
  hereof.</font></div>
            </td>
          </tr></table>
    </div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div>
      <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">

      TRUSTEE.&#160;&#160;The Trustee shall not be responsible in any manner
      whatsoever for or in respect of the validity or sufficiency of this Third
      Supplemental Indenture or for or in respect of the recitals contained
      herein, all of which recitals are made solely by the Issuer, the
      Subsidiary Guarantors and the New
Subsidiary.</font></div>

      <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Exhibit
12.1</font></div>
      <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
      <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">RATIO
OF EARNINGS TO FIXED CHARGES</font></div>
      <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
      <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The
following table sets forth our ratio of earnings to fixed charges on a reported
basis for the periods indicated.&#160;&#160;Earnings consist of income from
continuing operations plus fixed charges.&#160;&#160;Fixed charges consist of
interest expense and amortization of deferred financing costs.&#160;&#160;We
have calculated the ratio of earnings to fixed charges by adding net income from
continuing operations to fixed charges and dividing that sum by such fixed
charges.</font></div>
      <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
      <div align="left">
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" style="FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman">

      Ended December 31,</font></div>

      expense</font></div>

12.2</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">RATIO
OF EARNINGS TO</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">COMBINED
FIXED CHARGES AND PREFERRED STOCK DIVIDENDS</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 36pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">The
following table sets forth our ratio of earnings to combined fixed charges and
preferred stock dividends on a reported basis for the periods
indicated.&#160;&#160;Earnings consist of income from continuing operations plus
fixed charges.&#160;&#160;Fixed charges consist of interest expense and
amortization of deferred financing costs.&#160;&#160;We have calculated the
ratio of earnings to combined fixed charges and preferred stock dividends by
adding net income from continuing operations to fixed charges and dividing that
sum by such fixed charges plus preferred dividends, irrespective of whether or
not such dividends were actually paid.</font></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
    <div align="left">

      Ended December 31,</font></div>

            <td nowrap valign="bottom" style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</font></td>

              </div>
            </td>
            <td nowrap valign="bottom" style="TEXT-ALIGN: left; PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</font></td>
            <td valign="bottom" style="PADDING-BOTTOM: 2px"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">&#160;</font></td>

                <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Registration
      Statement (Form S-8 No. 333-61354) related to the 2000 Stock Incentive
      Plan of Omega Healthcare Investors,
Inc.;</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr></table>
      </div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">

              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">

              <td>
                <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">Registration

    <div>&#160;</div>
    <div><br>
      <div>
        <hr style="COLOR: black" align="center" noshade size="4" width="100%">
      </div><br></div>
    <div>
      <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">Exhibit
31.2</font></div>
      <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
      <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">RULE
13a-14(a)/15d-14(a) CERTIFICATION OF CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER</font></div>
      <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
      <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">I, Robert
O. Stephenson, certify that:</font></div>
      <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify">&#160;</div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">

      </div><br></div>
    <div>
      <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="right"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">EXHIBIT

      <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
      <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
      <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 27pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">SECTION
1350 CERTIFICATION</font></div>
      <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 27pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="center"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-WEIGHT: bold">OF

      <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
      <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 27pt; DISPLAY: block; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">I, Robert

of 2002, 18 U.S.C. Section 1350, that, to the best of my knowledge:</font></div>
      <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">
<tr valign="top">
              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(1)&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">the
      Annual Report on Form 10-K of the Company for the year ended December 31,
      2009 (the &#8220;Report&#8221;) fully complies with the requirements of Section 13(a)
      or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended,
      and</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr></table>
      </div>
      <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; DISPLAY: block"><br></div>
      <div>
        <table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" id="list" width="100%" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: times new roman">

              <td align="right" style="WIDTH: 36pt">
                <div><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">(2)&#160;&#160;</font></div>
              </td>
              <td>
                <div style="TEXT-INDENT: 0pt; MARGIN-LEFT: 0pt; MARGIN-RIGHT: 0pt" align="justify"><font style="DISPLAY: inline; FONT-FAMILY: Times New Roman; FONT-SIZE: 10pt">the
      information contained in the Report fairly presents, in all material
      respects, the financial condition and results of operations of the
      Company.</font></div>
              </td>
            </tr></table>
